processing.removing: Removing GPS and metadata from your images

keepICC.label: Keep ICC color profile
keepICC.description: Preserves color accuracy but increases file size. Recommended for photos requiring color precision.

forceJPEG.label: Force output to JPEG
forceJPEG.description: Converts PNG/WebP to JPEG. May increase file size for images with transparency.

preview.title: Metadata Found!
preview.subtitle: We found {count} metadata items in your {fileCount} files. Review what will be removed below.
preview.privacyNotice: All processing happens in your browser - files never leave your device
preview.gpsNone: Not detected (will be removed if present)
preview.gpsNoDescription: EXIF/XMP/IPTC metadata will be cleaned. Undetected items are also processed for removal

preserved.title: What's preserved
preserved.description: The actual image content, dimensions, and quality remain unchanged. Color profiles are removed by default but can be preserved via Advanced options.

important.title: Important Disclaimer
important.content: We remove standard metadata (EXIF/IPTC/XMP/GPS), but cannot guarantee removal of every vendor-specific tag. For highly sensitive files, verify before sharing.

content.title: Content Notice
content.content: Image content itself may reveal information (e.g., signs, locations, faces) independent of metadata.

privacy.title: 100% Private Processing
privacy.description: Your images never leave your device. No uploads, no servers, no data collection.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Process multiple images instantly with modern browser technology.

install.title: No Installation Required
install.description: Works in any modern browser. Bookmark and use anywhere, anytime.

upload.question: Do you upload my files?
upload.answer: No, all processing is local. Your files never leave your browser. We use modern web technologies to process images entirely on your device.

metadata.question: What metadata gets removed?
metadata.answer: We remove GPS coordinates, device/camera information, timestamps, XMP/IPTC blocks, embedded previews/thumbnails, and software information. This includes location data that could reveal where photos were taken.

formats.question: Which formats are supported?
formats.answer: JPEG/JPG, PNG, and WebP formats are fully supported. HEIC and AVIF can be processed if your browser supports local decoding (newer browsers and devices).

limits.question: Is there a file size or quantity limit?
limits.answer: There are no artificial limits. However, processing is limited by your device's memory and processing power. We recommend processing batches of 10-20 images at a time for optimal performance.

footer.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. No uploads, no tracking.

errors.generic: An error occurred while processing your images.
